text: Ne Musa olwa yoola khubise biefu, mana Nyasaye wuwe nalomaloma ninaye, yaboola mbu:“Nyasaye wanje nzechesiekhwo ekhulole” Yaboola; mbu: “shiwakhandola tawe halali henga khu lwanda-luli imbeli wuwo olo nilulatong’a habundu walwo oba witsa okhundola.” Kho Nyasaye wuwe olwa yelolosia khulwanda yakhola olwanda lwa tonyokha tonyokha, mana Musa nakwa hasi nasuma. Olwa yakalusia omwoyo naboola mbu;“oluyali nolulwo, esaba obulesheli khwiwe, nasi endi mubasuubili bokhuranga ”
